ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Rules and FAQ 2.3 - PLEASE READ THIS!
ygData.msgSnippet: Wasn t a ding on you Rokenn.  I think we can all agree that John (aka Kaearia on the Concert Hall) is one of the preeminent bard testers in the game.  I don t
ygData.messageBody:
Wasn't a ding on you Rokenn. I think we can all agree that John (aka
Kaearia on the Concert Hall) is one of the preeminent bard testers in the
game. I don't recall seeing any posts from him recently on this list.
However, I've seen a lot of his recent posts on the Concert Hall so know he
is still around. I was only trying to make him feel guilty about not
posting on this list for a while:-)

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 9:30 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rules and FAQ 2.3 - PLEASE READ THIS!


Thanks for the vote of confidence Gatin

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4
> [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 12:16 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rules and FAQ 2.3 - PLEASE READ THIS!
>
>
> Where is John Kim when we need him?
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
> Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 3:36 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rules and FAQ 2.3 - PLEASE READ THIS!
>
>
> The effects of the LoGP and the Gyspy Lute are not appearent
> till 47th lvl
> when you get Niv's. Niv's with a regular lute adds 20 str.
> With a LoGP or
> a Gypsy Lute it adds 21 str. This equals a 5% bonus.
>
> One note on this, Gordon recently posted that the reason
> instruments to do
> not list this is beacuse each song is effected DIFFERNTLY by magic
> instruments. I need to make a few changes to my testing procedures to
> account for this. Most likely I will just choose specific
> songs to for
> testing. Do not want to test every song with every
> instrument. I'd rather
> play the game :)
>
> Rokenn
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
> > Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 6:10 AM
> > To: eqbards@egroups.com

> >

> >
> > The Lute of the Gypsy Princess ... which has no
> > discernible special effect.
> > The Gypsy Lute ... which has no known special
> > abilities.
> >
> > Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
> > The screeching Bard
